text: Melathu Veettil Raghavan (born 5 May 1933 - 9 November 2014) was a veteran Communist leader and a former Minister in Kerala state of India. He is the General Secretary of Communist Marxist Party, an alliance partner in the United Democratic Front. Raghavan died of Parkinson's disease, aged 81. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians from Kerala Category:Indian communist politicians
title: M. V. Raghavan
